name: email-parser
title: Email Parser
description: Extract addresses, subjects, and metadata from .eml email files
content:
Overview

This application parses .eml email files and extracts structured information including email addresses, subject lines, headers, attachments, and body content. It uses Python's built-in email module for reliable parsing.

Features

  • Extract all email addresses (From, To, Cc, Bcc, Reply-To)
  • Parse email headers (Subject, Date, Message-ID)
  • Extract attachment information
  • Get email body preview
  • Output in JSON or plain text format

Parameters

  • Input Email File: Upload your .eml file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the parsed output
  • Output Format: Choose JSON or text format

Output

The application generates a file named {original_name}_parsed.json or {original_name}_parsed.txt with all extracted email information.

Use Cases

  • Extract contact information from emails
  • Analyze email headers for troubleshooting
  • Archive email metadata
  • Bulk email processing
command: rm -rf prod_apps || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python $REPO_DIR/python/email_parser.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -f "${outputFormat}"
